Texts.Chs: 随着养蜂技术的提升，你的蜂园产量将会^orange;越来越多^reset;。
Texts.Eng: As your bee-tech gets more advanced you'll get ^green;superior output^reset; from your bee farm.

Texts.Chs: 要从^orange;蜂巢^reset;提炼出蜂蜜，你首先需要建造一台^orange;木制离心机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: To extract the goodies from ^green;honeycombs^reset; produced by your bees, you are going to need a ^orange;Wooden Centrifuge^reset;.
